summary: I OWN A 2002 DODGE RAM 1500 WITH THE 4.7 V-8.  THE VEHICLE HAS A TENDENCY TO STALL AND IDLE LOW.  AT RANDOM TIMES, THE TRUCK HAS A WILD FLUCTUATION AT IDLE, SURGING FROM 400RPM TO 1300 RPM FOR APPROX 15 SECONDS BEFORE THE COMPUTER CORRECTS THE IDLE.  I TOOK THE TRUCK TO THE DEALER AND THEY WERE NOT ABLE TO FIND ANY PROBLEMS WITH THE VEHICLE.   *NLM
